flawed_nl_solution:
Alix has 3 * 10 = <<3*10=30>>30 chocolates.
After his mom took 5 chocolates, Alix has now 30 - 5 = <<30-5=25>>25 chocolate.
So Alix has 25 - 10 = <<25-10=19>>19 chocolates more than Nick.
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
